CN.content:

Paragraph: Four model compounds , ( BDTT - DPP ) 3 , (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) , (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) , and ( BDTT - TPD ) 3 were used and calculated for comparison.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| (BDTT-DPP) 3 |
| (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) |
| (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) |
| (BDTT-TPD) 3 |

These entities clearly refer to specific chemical compounds, and can be considered as material names.
